about_the_game:
Let the voodoo beats and jazzy tunes wash you over with the official Blasted Fortress soundtrack! Musician Chris Sinnott of Sinnott Soundworks has released every tune you can find in the game as downloadable content for Blasted Fortress owners.

What's Included

Music from the title screen, camp, siege, all 3 speeds of the beast battle music and even the tiniest jingles are available as a part of this pack. In other words, all music present and future that is a part of Blasted Fortress will be included!
